'''Hannah''', better known by her username '''Hannahxxrose''', is an American [[Twitch]] streamer and [[YouTube]]r who specializes in playing ''[[Minecraft]]''. Within the community, she is known for her activity in the {{Wikipedia|Hypixel}} [[Bedwars]] minigame.

== In the ''Minecraft'' franchise ==
In 2023, Hannah partnered with ''[[LEGO]]'' to create several builds.<ref>{{YouTube link|jFIgDPiuDeY|Minecraft Made Real with the LEGO Group and Hannahxxrose|LEGO|March 30, 2023}}</ref><ref name=":0">{{Tweet|hannahxxrose|1641455461131251713|Iâ€™m excited to be partnering with @LEGO_Group<br> to create builds in Minecraft AND real life using the LEGO Minecraft sets!<br><br>It was super fun getting creative with these builds and I hope this video inspires you to do the same! #ad<br><br>Check it out: https://youtu.be/jFIgDPiuDeY}}</ref> In 2024, Hannah released a promotion for the then-recent release of [[Flippin' Figs]], recommending the [[axolotl]].<ref name=":1">{{Cite Instagram|hannahxxrose|C77vR62PxeJ|#AD The new Minecraft Flippinâ€™ Figs are the perfect way for us Minecraft fans to fidget and collect our favorite character figures from the game! My favorite is the Axolotl! ðŸ’— Check them out today! @Mattel #Mattel #Minecraft Â©2024 Mojang AB. TM Microsoft Corporation.|June 7, 2024}}</ref> To promote the collaboration with [[Minecraft x Fossil|Fossil]], she would be invited over to [[Mojang Studios]].<ref name=":2">{{Cite Instagram|hannahxxrose|DHZl1T5MeBI|Had the best time in Stockholm at Mojang Studios with @fossil ðŸ’š It was so fun celebrating the launch of the Fossil x Minecraft collection âœ¨ #FossilxMinecraft #FossilCollective #ad|March 19, 2025}}</ref><ref>{{Cite Instagram|hannahxxrose|DHvw8jpIIhb|*in @jackblackâ€™s voice* MINECRAFT|March 28, 2025}}</ref><ref>{{Tweet|hanniexxrose|1899933517171351987|at a very cool location right nowâ€¦ ðŸ˜„}}</ref>

In 2025, Hannah appeared as a guest at the {{AMCM|green carpet}} premiere of {{AMCM}}.

=== Events ===
In 2023, Hannah appeared in the [[Minecraft Legends Live Event]] as one of the two hosts, alongside [[Jens Bergensten]] as {{MCL|Jeb}}.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-legends-themed-event|Minecraft Legends-themed event|May 10, 2023|Cristina Anderca}}</ref><ref>{{Tweet|hannahxxrose|1657072021090467855|The Minecraft Legends-themed event Iâ€™m hosting alongside Jens Bergensten is now live in the Minecraft Bedrock Edition!<br><br>Use the below link to learn more about the event and how to join our fight to protect the Overworld: https://minecraft.net/en-us/article/minecraft-legends-themed-event<br><br>#MinecraftPartner}}</ref>

In 2024, she participated in the [[Ender Cup]], a special edition of [[MC Championship]] made for the 15th anniversary of Minecraft. To promote the event, Hannah once again voiced a fictionalized version of herself in the [[event server]] [[MCC x Minecraft 15th Anniversary Party]]. She would return to participate in [[Colour the World]] the following year, and again at [[The Copper Crown]].
